titleStmt.title: A sober word to a serious people: or, A moderate discourse respecting as well the Seekers, (so called) as the present churches. Wherein the difference between them touching visible administrations, is discovered and discussed: and may serve as a plea for the nations ministery. / By a lover of truth and peace.
titleStmt.author: Jackson, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Cottrel for James Noell, in Foster-lane; and are to be sold by Giles Calvert, at the black Spread-Eagle neer the west-end of Pauls.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Jackson by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
